tasks.task: Understand the mindset needed for successful pig farming.
subtasks: Assess personal readiness for pig farming.
Develop a clear business plan (breeder, partner, etc.).
Create a detailed budget considering capital-intensive nature.
Start small and gradually expand the farm.
Allocate resources effectively (focus on animals, improve structures later).
Invest in knowledge and train workers.
Be prepared for and resilient to challenges.
Prayer for God's help and guidance.
